comments:
1.  Create a dynamic web project (name it foo) and publish it to a tomcat 5.0 server.  (Haven't tried it with other servers)
2.  Right click on the project in the java perspective and choose "Refactor/Rename"
3.  Change the project name to "bar"
4.  The project rebuilds
5.  Switch to the servers pane in the debug perspective
6.  Expand the tomcat 5.0 server, notice that the project is still "foo"

You should just be able to republish to the server, or I guess maybe this should happen automatically.  In any case when I try and republish, I get this error:
